basics.label: Business Development Manager
basics.summary: An experienced manager who is highly motivated and has vast knowledge of the retail industry. Able to handle high-profile and hands-on management roles that require commercial acumen and creative flair. Ambitious and passionate about everything and comes from a strong sales and service background that allows to thrive in any competitive and challenging retail environments. Qualified for the next stage in an already hugely successful career and is looking forward to making a significant contribution to any future employer.

work.summary: Handling Brand Raymond. Develop sales and marketing strategies to drive sales growth in the assigned area.
highlights: Opened 4 EBO'S of U.S.POLO Assn. stores
Opened 5 EBO's and 50 MBO's for the brand John Players
Achieved Best B.D.M Award for 0% shrinkage in my entire region
Increased the sales volumes by over 70% in a single financial year for all brands
Established the market for MBO (Denizen) Channel in Coastal A.P. territory
Achieved the Best Store Manager Award for Highest sales in a month (January 2010) for The Peter England store
Opened the first ever Double Brand store (U.S.POLO Assn. & Flying Machine)

work.summary: Work involves selling the popular Premium brand John Players.
Work involves selling the popular premium brands in FASHION QUOTIENT
Work involves selling the popular brand Peter England
Work involves selling the above brands and local brands

skills.name: Management
keywords: Ability to lead and motivate a team

keywords: Voyager, Shopper 08, 09 ,Tally & Focus Integrated ERP software for Retail Garment Stores
